meanings.definition: A person who administers a specified amount of medication.
meanings.sent1: The doseh carefully measured the medicine for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The doseh handed out the correct amount of pills to each person.
meanings.sent3: The doseh dressed up as a superhero for Halloween, with a pill bottle belt.
meanings.sent4: She was the doseh of happiness, spreading joy like medicine to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The doseh's role was crucial, ensuring everyone received the right treatment.

meanings.definition: The amount of a substance that is taken at one time.
meanings.sent1: He took a small doseh of cough syrup before bed.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a specific doseh of antibiotics for the infection.
meanings.sent3: The doseh of hot sauce he poured on his food made his eyes water.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a doseh of happiness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The doseh of sunlight through the window warmed the room instantly.

meanings.definition: To administer a specified amount of medication to someone.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will doseh the patient with pain relief after surgery.
meanings.sent2: She carefully dosehed out the correct amount of liquid medicine.
meanings.sent3: He dosehed out high-fives to everyone in the room after the game.
meanings.sent4: The chef dosehed the dish with a sprinkle of herbs for flavor.
meanings.sent5: The coach dosehed encouragement to the team before the big match.
